features: Motion Fit™: Pattern engineering to enable unrestricted freedom of movement for each sport

AdvancedSkin Dry 20K/20K: AdvancedSkin Dry 20K/20K is the ultimate protection against rain, snow and wind, with great breathability to keep you comfortable. AdvancedSkin Dry 20K/20K provides 20,000mm waterproofness and breathability of 20,000g/m²/24h
Synthetic insulation 80g/m²: Regulates your Body climate to keep you comfortable and warm
Fiberfill fibers reflect the warmth of your body and help it retain heat so you feel comfortable and warm, even when the garment is wet
